ranks.text: Unlocked automatically via the story on 7/24.
Story progress triggers this rank on 8/28.
In quick succession this rank will happen on 10/26.

This rank triggers via the story on 10/29.Unlocks the Baton Pass ability, allowing Goro to pass his turn to another character after a 1 More.Unlocks the Follow Up ability which lets Goro attack the enemy in a follow-up after Joker on occasion.Unlocks Hairsen Recovery, which lets Goro occasionally help allies up when they're impacted by a status effect.Unlocks Detective Talk, which lets him step in when shadow negotiation is failed.
Unlocks with the story progression on 11/29.
The story continues, and this unlocks on 11/20.
Unlocks throughout the course of the sixth palace.
Unlocks as you progress through the sixth palace.Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Goro's Persona to its final form.
